_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Jellyfin
author: Matheusn.biolowons@gmail.com
description:
💎 Egg: Jellyfin
⚙️ Version: 2.1
❓ What is it: In short, you can have your own Netflix. Jellyfin allows you to collect, manage, and stream your media. Run the Jellyfin server on your system and enjoy access to the leading open-source entertainment software system.
🐛 Fixed Bugs/Changelogs:
• Now Egg is no longer dependent on updates; everything is handled by scripts, resulting in better maintenance.
• This is possibly its final version.
• Code is now cleaner.
• Docker updated.
⚠️ Attention: Upon first startup, you will see a "Select Server" screen; delete the existing server there and refresh the page.
👑 Author: Ashu
👀 Check for updates at: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
## install packages to get version and download links
apt update
apt upgrade -y
apt install -y curl wget unzip git tar ca-certificates jq fuse xz-utils
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect/en/Jellyfin/install.sh)

variables.name: VERSION
variables.description:
Version of Jellyfin.

Ex: 10.9.6 | latest | beta
